Uses of Interface
com.ibm.mfp.server.security.external.checks.IntrospectionResponse

  • Packages that use IntrospectionResponse 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.mfp.server.security.external.checks  

    • Uses of IntrospectionResponse in com.ibm.mfp.server.security.external.checks

      Methods in com.ibm.mfp.server.security.external.checks with parameters of type IntrospectionResponse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SecurityCheck.introspect(java.util.Set scope, IntrospectionResponse response)
      Make sure this check currently grants the requested scope.
      If the scope is granted, the implementation should add the granted scope, its expiration, and custom introspection data to the response parameter.
